frontmatter.title: Prometheus
frontmatter.subtitle: Discover and connect to your Prometheus servers and Operators
frontmatter.howItWorks: Connect and use metrics in Meshery
frontmatter.howItWorksDetails: Meshery provides performance reports, including performance test results, node resource metrics etc. so that operators may easily understand the overhead of their service mesh’s control plane and data plane in context of the overhead incurred on nodes running within the cluster. In order to generate performance test reports of service meshes and their workloads, Meshery uses Grafana and/or Prometheus as visualization and metrics systems, respectively. This guide outlines the requirements necessary for Meshery to connect to these systems. The steps may vary depending upon the service mesh and its configuration.
featureList: Create custom charts with your own Prometheus queries
Keep charts in-sync with Meshery's panel viewer
